replies.body:
I understand it can be frustrating when games won't start due to a technical issue. However, regardless of intention, a disconnection negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. This is a big reason why disconnections are all treated equally and why leaverbuster penalties cannot be modified for any reason.

I'd definitely recommend updating your display driver to the most **recent and stable** one available. Additionally, you may want to run Windows updates and install the Directx 9c package [here.](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429) Let me know if those steps resolved your issue.

You didn't get my point.., the system fail " leavebuster " it need so major update with the tech we have now days. making ppl lose time over your program not working correctly. That was a point i was trying to make, Proof was show and that ok, im down to 1 match with that retard LB system.
